summary: This will add a body paint to your favourite race.
descriptionHtml:
Hello!


These are templates which contain a female body paint (BodyPaint.dds/BodyPaintNormal.dds) and a female face paint (FacePaint.dds/FacePaintNormal.dds).
The textures are ready to use (copy&paste) with the image editing program Paint.NET (search with google).
I\'ve chosen Paint.NET because it\'s freeware and don\'t need a *.dds plugin.


ATTENTION: Don\'t try to install this mod with NexusModManager!!!


I release this mod as templates because there are several custom races available with their own face and body textures, so everyone can edit his/her favourite texture. Using this mod with custom races and the unp/unpb body (the bodypaint texture is aligned to this bodymod) is highly recommended. 
CBBE should also work but I have not tested it.


The download file is a 7z archive which contains the textures and a folder called PictureTutorial.

In this folder are image files named Picture No 1 - No 8 and Resizing. With these files I explain step by step how to attach the textures to your face/body textures (please read carefully). Don\'t be afraid it isn\'t difficult at all, just make Backups of the files you want to edit and nothing can happen.

If you have any problems or questions feel free to leave a comment or pm me.


Have fun! 

You may also like:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17095]ADEC Drow[/url] by foooterman with optional body paint texture
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28712]BEANS REVISION-Aranea-Jenassa-Brelyna-Iona-Jordis-Lydia[/url] by sumojellybean

Skintexture used for ScreenShots: 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24318]Barbarian and Milkdrinker Skin UNP and UNPB[/url] by HoneyVanity

Credits:
Bethesda for the femaleheadorcwarpaint_04.dds which I\'ve used as the base for the facepaint.
author: Wast1980
